Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Thusin (ThsA1, ThsA2; natural AMPs; two-chain lantibiotic, type 2, class 1 bacteriocins; UCSS2b; Gram-positive bacteria, prokaryotes)

Literature Information.Literature: APD analysis reveals that the sequence of THE PEPTIDE shows poor sequence similarity (46.2%) toBHT-A1.Activity: It is active when mixed with another chain (seq: GTPAITTAISAIIAATAQSPCPTSACSKSCNK) at a 1:1 ratio. Active against S. pneumoniae ATCC 49619, B. cereus ATCC 14579, B.  thuringiensis BMB171, B. pumilus SCG I , B. subtilis Bsn5,  L. monocytogenes LM201 (MIC 6.25 uM), L. monocytogenes LM605, S. aureus ATCC 43300, S. sciuri Bom1,  B. amyloliquefaciens X1 (MIC 12.5 uM),   S. aureus CMCC 26003, MRSA (MIC 25 uM), and E. faecalis ATCC 29212 (MIC 50 uM).
Literature Information.Author: Xin B, Zheng J, Liu H, Li J, Ruan L, Peng D, Sajid M, Sun M.2016
Literature Information.Title: Thusin, a Novel Two-Component Lantibiotic with Potent Antimicrobial Activity against Several Gram-Positive Pathogens.
